channel.title: Postgres Changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Postgres.app 2.7.7
item.description:
• PostgreSQL 12.20 with PostGIS 3.0.11
  • PostgreSQL 13.16 with PostGIS 3.1.11
  • PostgreSQL 14.13 with PostGIS 3.2.7
  • PostgreSQL 15.8 with PostGIS 3.3.6
  • PostgreSQL 16.4 with PostGIS 3.4.2
  • PostgreSQL 17rc1 with PostGIS 3.5.0alpha2

You can find more info on the Github Releases Page.
